title: Welcome to Abby Volkâ€™s Website
text:
Hi, my name is Abby. I am a scientist and recent graduate of The Ohio State University currently interning with the National Park Service.
I am developing this website as a way to practice simple website deployment and track my progress over time. I am working on projects and gaining skills related to any of my scientific interests:

Biology and Environmental Science

Metagenomics and viromics
Bioinformatics
Water and hydrology
Climate science
Geospatial analysis

Statistics and data analysis
Programming and development
